opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Disbarment of Price. No. D-1336

opinion:
510 U.S. 1022

In re Disbarment of Price.
No. D-1336.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 13, 1993.

1

It is ordered that Wayne Jeffrey Price, of Brooklyn, N. Y., be suspended from the practice of law in this Court and that a rule issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
